resources.string: Everyone is responsible for separating garbage!

Encourage recyclables to be sold into the waste recycling system, or handed over to the two network integration service points, or put into the recyclables collection containers; strictly prohibit hazardous waste to other household waste collection containers; daily household waste should be separated from dry and wet waste.

Cast lightly 
 keep clean and dry, avoid pollution 
 waste paper as flat as possible 
 three-dimensional packaging, please empty the contents, clean and flatten put 
 sharp edges, should be wrapped and put

Pure liquid food waste, such as milk, should be poured directly into the downspout Wet garbage with packaging should be separated after removing the packaging, and the packaging should be put into the corresponding recyclables or dry garbage container
Drain as much water as possible Difficult to identify the type of household waste should be put into the dry garbage containers
Please be careful when putting it down If easily damaged, please put it gently with the package or wrap it. If it is volatile, please seal it and put it in
Notification bar permission is not enabled
Please turn on the notification bar permission of the app, otherwise you will not be able to use some functions properly.

Refers to suitable for recycling and resource utilization of household waste. Recyclables mainly include: waste paper, waste plastic bottles, waste metals, waste packaging, waste textiles, waste electrical and electronic products, waste glass, waste paper-plastic-aluminum composite packaging, etc.

Cast lightly \\n clean and dry, avoid pollution \\n waste paper as flat as possible \\n three-dimensional packaging, please empty the contents, clean and flatten put \\n sharp edges, should be wrapped and put
Dry garbage is other garbage, refers to other domestic waste in addition to recyclable waste, hazardous waste, wet waste
Drain as much water as possible Difficult to identify the type of household waste into the dry garbage container

It refers to the waste that causes direct or potential harm to human health or natural environment living. Common hazardous waste includes waste lamps, waste paint, pesticides, waste cosmetics, expired drugs, waste batteries, waste light bulbs, waste water silver thermometers, etc. Hazardous waste needs to be disposed of safely in accordance with special and correct methods.
Please be careful when putting it down If easily damaged, please put it gently with the package or wrap it. If it is volatile, please seal it and put it in

Perishable garbage (kitchen garbage), also known as wet garbage, generally refers to food operators, unit canteens and other food waste generated in the production process, as well as perishable garbage generated in household life, mainly including: leftovers, vegetable stems and leaves, meat offal, fruit shells and melon rinds, etc.

Pure liquid food waste, such as milk, should be dumped directly into the downspout Wet garbage with packaging should be separated after removing the packaging, and the packaging should be put into the corresponding recyclables or dry garbage container
Protection of the environment is everyone\'s responsibility
